monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Armory
skills.description: Aura: Increases the stats gained from accessories by 15% for allied Warrior Monsters.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Shock on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

skills.name: Chain Reaction
skills.description: When attacking a single target, trigger Shock (Debuff) Damage on all enemies.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Critical Base
skills.description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% while wearing no equipment that increases Critical Chance.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Dual Wield
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Electric Field
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Shock on the attacker.

skills.name: Electric Surge
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (500 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack), 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Electrolytes
skills.description: Unique Aura: Monsters in the party have a 75% chance to remove a Debuff from themselves when they trigger Shock damage.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Slash
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magnetize
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock on enemies causes their attacks to have a 15% chance to be redirected to the Monster in your party with the highest Defense value.

skills.name: Mana Generator
skills.description: Regenerate 4 Mana for every hit this Monster receives.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Mega Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield all for 3 x (250 + 30% Defense)

skills.name: Multi Shock
skills.description: Aura: Shock (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Safecast
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Severe Cuts
skills.description: 6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Severe Cuts Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Shocking Slash
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Shocking Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Shocking Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Variety
skills.description: Every attack deals 15% increased damage when used for the first time during combat. (Different levels count as same attack)

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
